name: Curley Laboratory (Kirley Game Studios)
description:
Explore the Red Vine Initiative and meet their famous creations who will bring you a bunch of joy! BUT! There are 3 rules? Don't go hiding. Don't Touch it & Don't get caught!

Download the Game on Steam for FREE!!! Chapter - 1 "First Encounter"

Story.

You get called in for a shift to work again at the "Red Vine Initiative"
Soon you realise that all of you co-workers have mysteriously vanished.
You find something Greg Dodds, created known as Curley! A creature with a joyful smile.

@GamesKirley - Lead Director & Animator 

@omogonix - Lead Programmer 

@DemonsSound - Lead Artist 

@Burningdateye - Art & Character Designer 

@salih_game - Layout Designer.
